isUsingCentralLabel

public boolean isUsingCentralLabel()
Flag to indidcate whether this tree structure is actually using central label VO for any of the data source.

Returns:
Y if any data source is using "oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.trees.model.view.FndLabelVO" as label VO

isLabelRequired

public boolean isLabelRequired()
Indicate whether the label information is required for this tree structure.

Returns:
true if the label enforcement is optional.

isUsingViewLink

public boolean isUsingViewLink()
Indicate whether this tree structure has any data source using view link.

Returns:
true if any Data Source registers view link accessor
